thread.title_full: Disposable Syringes Market (Safety and Conventional Syringes): Global Industry Analysis 2015

title: Disposable Syringes Market (Safety and Conventional Syringes): Global Industry Analysis 2015
text:
Print Related Content Dublin, July 01, 2015 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Research and Markets ( http://www.researchandmarkets.com/research/vc5dqk/disposable ) has announced the addition of the "Disposable Syringes Market (safety and conventional syringes): Global Industry Analysis, Size, Volume, Share, Growth, Trends and Forecast 2014 - 2022" report to their offering. 
The global disposable syringes market was valued at USD 4,935.7 million in 2013 and is projected to reach USD 7,552.5 million by 2022, expanding at a CAGR of 4.9% during the forecast period from 2014 to 2022. 
Growth in the injectable drugs market along with increasing needlestick injuries has boosted demand for safe disposable syringes across the world. Disposable syringes have been identified as one of the fastest growing segments of the syringe market, accounting for approximately 70% to 80% of the global market in 2013. Globally, disposable syringes are becoming more popular than re-usable syringes, primarily due to cost, accuracy, sterility, and ease of handling. Increasing cases of needlestick injuries, strict regulatory guidelines, and overall growth in the injectable drugs market have been identified as the major factors driving the growth of the global disposable syringes market. 
The disposable syringes market has been segmented into two major types: safety syringes and conventional syringes. Syringes equipped with safety mechanisms are known as safety syringes. Safety syringes have been further categorized into automatic retractable safety syringes, manual retractable safety syringes, and non-retractable safety syringes. Conventional syringes are not equipped with any kind of safety mechanisms. Conventional syringes have been classified into syringes without needles and syringes attached with needles. Key Topics Covered: Chapter 2 Executive Summary Chapter 3 Global Disposable Syringes Market Overview Chapter 4 Global Disposable Syringes Market Revenue (USD Million) and Volume (Million Units), by Type, 2012 - 2022 Chapter 5 Global Disposable Syringes Market Revenue (USD Million) and Volume (Million Units), by Geography, 2012 - 2022 Chapter 6 Recommendations
